entry.title: Caswell Massey Dr. Hunter's Castile Soap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Caswell Massey
Type: Men's Bodycare
Price: 8.00

Free of fragrance and preservatives, this is the purest, mildest bar soap we offer, making it ideal for sensitive skin. The gentle, richly lathering olive oil-based formula can be used for body, hands, face, and even as a shampoo for hair. Enriched with cocoa butter and jojoba oil, this all-natural plant-based bar produces a luxurious, moisturizing lather.

Named for Dr. William Hunter, the founder of our company, this castile soap was introduced in 1861, the recipe unchanged for over one hundred years.


BAR BENEFITS

  • Jojoba seed oil is similar to skin’s natural oils and provides deep hydration
  • Cocoa seed butter helps reduce skin’s moisture loss
  • Olive fruit oil contains essential fatty acids that are beneficial for dry skin
  • Lasts longer than liquid soap
  • No plastic bottles means less landfill waste
  • Better for travel—no leaking

PRODUCT DETAILS

  • 6.5 oz (184 g) bar
  • Sustainably packaged using FSC-certified paper
  • Fragrance free
  • No parabens, sulfates, or phthalates
  • Cruelty-free
  • Made in the USA

entry.title: Caswell Massey Centuries Signature Three-Soap Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Caswell Massey
Type: Men's Bodycare
Price: 22.00

Make your bath or shower ritual more indulgent with our long-lasting, plant-based, triple-milled soaps. Cleansing, moisturizing, and beautifully fragranced, they are the ideal way to start your morning or unwind after a long day. These three bestsellers—sweet Almond, fresh Lavender, and citrusy Verbena—will scent the air and lift your spirits as they treat your skin with a luxurious lather that rinses clean.

Good soap is one of life’s simple—but very important!—luxuries. We take bathing for granted, but it didn’t become popular in America until the mid-1800s. We aren’t bragging when we say that Caswell-Massey was ahead of the trend, creating superb soaps that helped people discover the health and emotional benefits of lathering up.


BAR BENEFITS

  • Glycerin locks moisture into skin
  • Lasts longer than liquid soap
  • No plastic bottles means less landfill waste
  • Store extras in a drawer to give clothes a fresh scent
  • Better for travel—no leaking

PRODUCT DETAILS

  • Three 5.8 oz (164 g) bars (one bar each of Almond, Lavender, and Verbena bar soaps)
  • Sustainably packaged using FSC-certified paper
  • No parabens, sulfates, or phthalates
  • Cruelty-free
  • Made in the USA

Enriched with plant-based extracts, this soothing cream makes hands soft and nourished, restoring youthful smoothness to skin. The non-greasy formula absorbs quickly and leaves lasting hydration, for hands and nails that are pampered and moisturized. The scent of honeysuckle and a hint of moss is ambrosial and intoxicating”a little indulgence to enjoy every time you treat your hands to this replenishing cream.

SKIN BENEFITS

  • Shea butter deeply moisturizes skin
  • Avocado oil replenishes skin with vitamins and fatty acids
  • Aloe vera extract soothes irritation
  • Yarrow extract is nourishing and restorative
  • Hops extract calms the skin and may help reduce collagen breakdown
  • Rosemary extract may help protect skin from free radical damage
  • Lemon balm extract imparts a smooth appearance
  • Chamomile extract is an anti-inflammatory

 

PRODUCT DETAILS

entry.title: Caswell Massey Fiber-Type Pomade
entry.summary:
Vendor: Caswell Massey
Type: Pomade & Hair Products
Price: 16.00

Touchable style for all! Caswell-Massey's Heritage Fibre Pomade is a conditioning, volumizing, texturizing pomade that delivers an all-day hold for all hair types. With a matte finish and light cedar scent, you get natural style without the grease. 

Fibre’s no joke – work this pomade with the heat of your hands and then run it through your hair to style to your preferred shape and texture. This is the ideal pomade for building volume on days when your hair needs an extra boost and maintaining an effortlessly styled look through work and into play.

HAIR BENEFITS

  • Sweet orange oil moisturizes hair and scalp
  • Rosemary oil soothes scalp
  • Water-based formula holds strong with no need to re-apply throughout the day and the formula washes out of hair without leaving behind unnecessary buildup

entry.title: Caswell Massey Heritage Number Six Shave Cream in Jar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Caswell Massey
Type: Shave Creams
Price: 20.00

Caswell-Massey’s Shave Creams have been the choice of some of the world’s finest barbers and used daily by generations of American men. With our Number Six Shave Cream, which receives its fragrance from the same exquisite botanical oils from our historic Number Six fragrance, we’ve elevated your morning ritual to the level of that of heads of state. With beautiful opening notes of citrus, neroli, bergamot & rosemary, you’ll soon understand why President George Washington selected our Number Six as his preferred fragrance.

Our uniquely smooth and creamy formula reminds us of the valued rituals passed down from one generation to another. Thick and rich, we designed our shave creams to lift and separate the hair so your razor glides effortlessly, delivering a clean, safe shave. Our recipe is intentionally non-foaming yet hydrating to allow you to wipe off the excess with a wet towel - no need to rinse, and suitable for use with or without a shave brush.  We offer our Number Six Shave Cream in a jar for those wishing to use a brush with their shave cream. Good for more than 100 shaves and made with clean ingredients - we stand by our legacy of quality and value, befitting a man’s sacred morning ritual.


HOW TO ENJOY

  1. Wet face with warm water
  2. Apply a small amount, quarter-sized amount, of shave cream to your fingertips or shave brush
  3. Massage gently into facial hairs to work up a lather and to soften follicles
  4. Select your shaving tool of choice 

  5. Slow shave recommended for those seeking an indulgent shaving experience, but our formula proves just as effective for quick shaves required by travel or gym

    BENEFITS

      • Naturally antimicrobial coconut oil base is an anti-inflammatory, skin soothing moisturizer
      • Hydraulics prevent razor burn and ingrown hairs
      • Chamomile for anti-inflammatory and calming properties
      • Thyme for antifungal and antiseptic properties
      • Vitamin A to promote healthy skin cell growth and to even skin tone
      • Vitamin E as an antioxidant to protect against free radicals and UV damage

      PRODUCT DETAILS

      • 8.0 oz (226gr) jar with screw lid
      • No parabens, sulfates, or phthalates
      • Cruelty free
      • Made in the USA

entry.title: Caswell Massey Heritage Almond Shave Cream in Jar

Vendor: Caswell Massey
Type: Shave Creams

Caswell-Massey’s Shave Creams have been the choice of some of the world’s finest barbers and used daily by generations of American men. For decades, our best-selling shave cream for dry skin, the Heritage Almond Shave Cream, has served as a testament to our legacy in men’s grooming. We offer our Almond Shave Cream in a jar for those wishing to use a brush with their shave cream. Our uniquely smooth and creamy formula reminds us of the valued rituals passed down from one generation to another.

Thick and rich, we designed our shave creams to lift and separate the hair so your razor glides effortlessly, delivering a clean, safe shave. Our recipe is intentionally non-foaming yet hydrating to allow you to wipe off the excess with a wet towel - no need to rinse and suitable for use with or without a shave brush. Good for more than 100 shaves and made with clean ingredients - we stand by our legacy of quality and value, befitting a man’s sacred morning ritual. The soothing almond scent finds inspiration from our popular Centuries Almond collection that elevates shaving to a treasured ritual.


HOW TO USE

  • Wet face with warm water
  • Apply a small amount, quarter-sized amount, of shave cream to your fingertips or shave brush
  • Massage gently into facial hairs to work up a lather and to soften follicles
  • Select your shaving tool of choice 
  • Slow shave recommended for those seeking an indulgent shaving experience, but our formula proves just as effective for quick shaves required by travel or gym

BENEFITS

  • Pure sweet almond oil for an all-natural, deep moisturizer
  • Coconut oil to reduce inflammation aided by natural antimicrobial properties
  • Chamomile for anti-inflammatory and calming properties
  • Thyme for antifungal and antiseptic properties
  • Vitamin A to promote healthy skin cell growth and to even skin tone
  • Vitamin E as an antioxidant to protect against free radicals and UV damage

PRODUCT DETAILS

  • 8.0 oz (226gr) jar with screw lid
  • No parabens, sulfates, or phthalates
  • Cruelty free
  • Made in the USA

entry.title: Caswell Massey Gold Cap Woodgrain Sandalwood After Shave
entry.summary:
Vendor: Caswell Massey
Type: Aftershaves
Price: 28.00

Now available as an after shave, our classic Heritage Woodgrain Sandalwood is a deep, spicy fragrance with notes of sandalwood, cedarwood, and clove. Importantly, the addition of menthol and glycerin allow the After Shave to soothe and refresh your skin post shave. The exotic, masculine fragrance evokes the aura of an old-school barbershop—if your barber were an early-20th century voyager returning from an adventure in India with a cache of thrilling elixirs. 

HOW TO ENJOY

  1. Pat face dry after after shaving with preferred shave cream, or soap, and razor

  2. Splash a small amount of tonic in your hand and apply to newly shaved area of face

BENEFITS

  • Revitalizes skin and closes pores, post-shave, to reduce redness
  • Antiseptic, to ward off infections from bacteria that cause irritation
  • Soothe razor burn
  • Includes menthol for a bracing, fresh and clean feeling

PRODUCT DETAILS

  • 3 oz (88 ml) bottle
  • No parabens, sulfates, or phthalates
  • Cruelty free
  • Made in the USA

entry.title: Caswell Massey Gold Cap Jockey Club After Shave
entry.summary:
Vendor: Caswell Massey
Type: Aftershaves
Price: 28.00

Long-lasting and bracing, our Jockey Club After Shave is fresh, dry, and undeniably masculine fragrance. The scent combines notes of citrus, florals, and wood, evoking the aura of an old-school barbershop. A bit of menthol provides a bracing feeling that adds the essential finishing touch to a good shave. Created in 1840, Jockey Club is one of America's first "sport" colognes, and upon introduction, it quickly became the ubiquitous scent from Saratoga to Churchill Downs. The appeal of Jockey Club extends far beyond the world of polo matches and horse racing, though, as a young John F. Kennedy was known to favor our Jockey Club.

HOW TO ENJOY

Originally formulated in 1772, Number Six is considered America’s first fragrance and the third oldest in continuous production. entry.title: Caswell Massey Heritage Greenbriar 15ml Cologne
entry.summary:
Vendor: Caswell Massey
Type: Colognes
Price: 18.00

Named after a timeless Southern ancestry and evoking the grace and understated sophistication of its regional distinction, Greenbriar is a beloved sporting scent. Mandarin and neroli mellow into sage and leave behind the warmth of vetiver and the subtlest hint of patchouli. It's refined, yet rugged.

FRAGRANCE FAMILY: GREEN AQUATIC FOUGERE
Top Notes: mandarin & neroli
Heart Notes: oakmoss & sage
Base Notes: patchouli, musk, & vetiver

HISTORY OF THE SCENT: Heritage Greenbriar is our modern expression of the 1980's version and incorporates many of its best qualities. Greenbriar has graced boardrooms and golf courses alike for decades. This classic, preppy scent is inspired by our long tradition of encapsulating meaningful American traditions.

PRODUCT DETAILS

  • 15 ml spray bottle
  • Sustainably packaged using FSC-certified paper
  • No parabens, sulfates, or phthalates
  • Cruelty-free
  • Made in the USA

entry.title: Caswell Massey Number Six Number Six 'Supernatural' Formulation
entry.summary:
Vendor: Caswell Massey
Type: Colognes
Price: 34.00

Working from the original handwritten recipe, we collaborated with famed perfumer Laurent Le Guernec to create a formula that is true to the original Number Six Fragrance, yet thoroughly modern. We chose floral and herbal distillations that would have been available in 1772 and blended them with natural, sustainably produced oils. And we updated the animal-derived ingredients (musk and ambergris) with cruelty-free plant-based components.

The result is a surprisingly contemporary fragrance that opens with smooth citrus and whispers of rose and clove, fortified with a strong amber influence. The dry-down is complex, with musk, myrrh, and a smooth balance of herbal notes. It's a modern scent with a classic soul, worthy of the moniker "Supernatural."

FRAGRANCE FAMILY: CITRUS WOODY
Top Notes: bergamot, rosemary, neroli
Heart Notes: amber, clove, dry rose
Base Notes: musk, lavender

 

HISTORY OF THE SCENT: Originally formulated in 1772, Number Six is considered America's first fragrance and the third oldest in continuous production. In 1780, America's first president discovered it at our Newport apothecary, becoming a repeat customer and gifting it to several of his friends, including the French aristocrat and American Revolutionary War commander, Marquis de Lafayette. One of the compendiums in the Caswell-Massey archive notes, our forefathers traveled by stagecoach with a flask of Number Six handy.

PRODUCT DETAILS

  • 3-ounce (88 ml) spray bottle
  • Sustainably packaged using FSC-certified paper
  • Made with natural essential oils produced with solar power
  • No parabens, sulfates, or phthalates
  • Cruelty-free
  • Made in the USA

entry.title: Merkur Double Edge Safety Razor, Straight Cut, Double Extra Long Handle, Gold
entry.summary:
Vendor: Merkur
Type: Double Edge Safety Razors
Price: 45.00

This double-edge razor can be seen as a longer version of the 23C which was made at the customer's request. With its extra-long handle, you gain freedom and range of movement. You can relax when shaving even the most delicate areas. The thin handle gets its high grip through a diamond-shaped cross-knurl.

    The rendition of this Merkur classic features modifications for enhanced grip. With an elongated handle and vintage finish crafted from famously durable steel, your customers can confidently purchase this best-selling product that will not rust.

    PROPERTIES

    Material - Brass handle, die-casted zinc razor head, galvanized surfaces, PVD coating in rose gold on chrome-plating

    Product Details - Closed comb, straight

    Locking system - Short screw, three-piece safety razor

    Handle Diameter - 1

    Dimensions - 4.2 cm x 2.5 cm x 12.6 cm

    Packaging - Carton box with window

    Honorably made in Solingen, Germany.
entry.s:tag: Double Edge Safety Razors for Retail
